EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_She's Pivotal_MO_Q216.Reminder 6-6-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder for She's Pivotal - Transforming Who's Building the World's Software
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the She’s Pivotal: Transforming Who’s Building the World’s Software. This is a FREE event which includes breakfast, lunch and parking.
We look forward to seeing you on Thursday, June 9, 2016.
Event Agenda 8:30–9:00am Breakfast
9:00am - 12:00pm Keynote Address, Overview of Technology Landscape, and Panel Discussion
12:00–1:00pm Lunch, Networking
1:00–2:30pm Professional Networking
2:30–4:00pm Hands-On Technology Workshops
Location: 911 Washington Ave., St. Louis, MO 63101 Map <[[http://downtowntrex.com/]]>
Parking: Please park at the lot north of the T-Rex building at N 10th Street and Lucas Ave. We will have volunteers on the street and at the parking lot to help direct vehicles into the parking lot spaces for this event.
Questions? Contact Bob Hoffman at rhoffman@pivotal.io <[[mailto:rhoffman@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you on June 9!
The Pivotal and Hack4Hope Team
